title: QPR vs Peterborough United - Latest score
shortDescription: Follow all the action from the Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium as QPR host Peterborough United. Watch live on the Sky Sports Football red button.

title: Palace rout Everton to claim semi-final spot
shortDescription: Crystal Palace produced a slick attacking performance to thrash Everton 4-0 and secure an FA Cup semi-final place at Wembley.

title: Ramsey and Goldson secure Rangers comeback win at Dundee
shortDescription: Connor Goldson's 86th-minute winner gave Rangers a late victory at Dundee as they managed to cut the gap on leaders Celtic back down to three points.

title: Southgate: Absence of some England fans in Qatar a 'great shame'
shortDescription: Gareth Southgate admits it is a "great shame" that sections of England supporters will not travel to Qatar for the World Cup this winter.

title: Papers: Italian giants send scouts to watch Gallagher
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Sunday's national newspapers...

title: Euro round-up: Inter drop points again | Bayern thrash Union Berlin
shortDescription: Inter Milan dropped points again in the Serie A title race when they were held to a 1-1 draw by Fiorentina, after Denzel Dumfries cancelled out Lucas Torreira's opener.

title: Goldman Sachs advising Boehly group on Chelsea bid as deadline passes
shortDescription: Goldman Sachs are advising a consortium led by LA Dodgers part-owner Todd Boehly as four bids are confirmed to have been submitted for the purchase of Chelsea.

title: Tuchel questions James' England selection | Who could replace him?
shortDescription: Thomas Tuchel says Reece James should not join up with England due to his current injury issue. If he does pull out, which right-back could replace him?

title: Terry backs Chelsea consortium | Rafferty: Fans must be heard
shortDescription: John Terry wants to protect Chelsea's "history and heritage" by joining the True Blues Consortium aimed at giving supporters a 10 per cent ownership in the club.

title: Chelsea end Boro's FA Cup run to reach Wembley again
shortDescription: Chelsea produced a professional performance at the Riverside Stadium to secure a 2-0 win and end Middlesbrough's impressive FA Cup run at the quarter-final stage.

title: Hendry nets added-time winner as Saints beat Motherwell
shortDescription: Callum Hendry scored a brilliant stoppage-time winner as St Johnstone came from behind to beat Motherwell 2-1.

title: Ferguson double pen helps Aberdeen beat 10-man Hibs
shortDescription: Aberdeen registered their first Premiership victory since Boxing Day by coming from behind to defeat 10-man Hibernian 3-1, and in doing so, revive their top-six hopes.

title: McKay on target as Hearts beat Livingston
shortDescription: Barrie McKay opened his account for Hearts with a stunning volley as the Gorgie side recorded a comfortable 2-0 victory over Livingston.

title: McNulty strikes late to hand Dundee Utd victory
shortDescription: Marc McNulty struck in injury time to hand Dundee United a much-needed 2-1 win at 10-man St Mirren.

title: Swansea & Birmingham draw a blank
shortDescription: Swansea held on for a 0-0 draw against a Birmingham side who dominated the contest in south Wales.

title: Bournemouth secure emphatic win at Huddersfield
shortDescription: AFC Bournemouth made a huge leap towards a return to the Premier League by comfortably beating promotion rivals Huddersfield Town.

title: Reach salvages dramatic point for West Brom
shortDescription: Substitute Adam Reach volleyed a stoppage-time equaliser to earn West Brom a point from a 2-2 Championship draw at Bristol City.

title: FA Cup preview: Can Forest claim Liverpool scalp?
shortDescription: Find out the team news and latest stats for this weekend's FA Cup quarter-finals, with Manchester City and Liverpool in action on Sunday.

title: Luton up to third after dominant win at Hull
shortDescription: Depleted Luton moved up to third in the Sky Bet Championship with a disciplined 3-1 victory at Hull.

title: Saka gives Arsenal crucial win at Villa
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Arsenal's win at Aston Villa in the Premier League.

title: Brown stars as Stoke beat Millwall
shortDescription: Jacob Brown inspired a much-needed 2-0 victory over Millwall to relieve pressure on Stoke boss Michael O'Neill.
